notes: The bonus damage is dealt in a separate damage instance, and counts as spell damage. This means it is not affected or considered by anything that works with attack damage. This also means that it fully works with spell damage amplification and spell lifesteal.
This means it is not affected or considered by anything that works with attack damage.
This also means that it fully works with spell damage amplification and spell lifesteal.
Successive attacks with Ballista do not stack the debuff, but refresh the duration and knockback instead.
The attacks first apply the debuff, then the knockback damage, then their own damage.
The target is not disabled during the knockback, so they still can cast spells or items, attack and turn during the push. This means it does not cancel channeling spells of the target.
This means it does not cancel channeling spells of the target.
abilities.description: Knocks back enemies 50 distance and deals 50 pure damage with every attack.

additionalInformation: Stacks with all other attack range bonuses.
Affects the cast range of active attack modifiers as well.
name: Ballista
description: A simple design much improved by a master smith's loving hand.
tips: Ballista is best shared with ranged carry heroes who rely on physical damage:
